es.uc3m.baldo.opinais.core.types

Class TypeBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.uc3m.baldo.opinais.core.types.TypeBuilder

  • public class TypeBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    TypeBuilder.

    Provides an interface to dynamically add new values to the Type enumerated.

    This class uses the power of reflection to alter the enum fields in runtime, in a somehow magical way.

    TODO: While this implementation is somehow curious, it is quite dangerous as it depends on low-level details of the compiler, so it may be replaced in the future.

    Author:
    Alejandro Baldominos

      • addType

        public static void addType(java.lang.String enumName)

        Adds a new type to the Type enumerated.

        Parameters:
        enumName - the name of the new enum instance to be added to the class.

      • makeEnum

        private static <T extends java.lang.Enum<T>> T makeEnum(java.lang.Class<T> enumClass,
                                       java.lang.String value,
                                       int ordinal)
                                          throws java.lang.Exception

        Builds a new Enum value by retrieving its constructor and calling it by reflection.

        Parameters:
        enumClass - the class of the enumerated type.
        value - the string representation of the enumerated.
        ordinal - the numeric representation of the enumerated, which may be an auto-incremental key.
        Returns:
        a new enumerated value.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getConstructorAccessor

        private static sun.reflect.ConstructorAccessor getConstructorAccessor(java.lang.Class<?> enumClass)
                                                               throws java.lang.NoSuchMethodException

        Returns the constructor for the enumerated type.

        Parameters:
        enumClass - the class of the enumerated type.
        Returns:
        the constructor for the enumerated type.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException

      • setFailsafeFieldValue

        private static void setFailsafeFieldValue(java.lang.reflect.Field field,
                         java.lang.Object value)
                                   throws java.lang.NoSuchFieldException,
                                          java.lang.IllegalAccessException

        Alters a field in a class, in a fail-safe way.

        Parameters:
        field - the field whose value is going to be modified.
        value - the new value for the field.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NoSuchFieldException
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException
